info.title: Arm API
info.description: REST API to manage your virtual devices.

type.format: URL for reading this image info

randomSeed.description: Random seed to provide to boot if any

noSnapshotMount.description: Do not mount IOS snapshot (iOS only)

cdhashes.description: cdhashes to inject to kernel (iOS only)

key.description: Key used to encrypt the Instance

flavor.description: The type of virtual machine this is

project.description: The projectId of the project this instance belongs to

stateChanged.description: Time the state of the instance last changed

ipsw.description: URL that ipsw used to create this instance is available at

key.description: Key used to encrypt the Instance

origIpswUrl.description: URL that ipsw used to create this instance is available at

bitCount.description: count of bits in members of this bank

banks.description: bits for each bank of this name as an array of arrays

instance.description: Instance that this snapshot is of

date.description: UNIX Date that the snapshot was created

orig_url.description: URL firmware is available at from vendor

post.description: If the active project has enough remaining quota, updates an Image with the contents of the request body.
